name: tautulli
tagline: A monitoring and analytics dashboard for Plex Media Server
description: Tautulli is a self-hosted monitoring and analytics tool for Plex Media Server. It tracks user activity, watch history, performance, and library stats, providing rich reports and notifications via an intuitive web dashboard and API.

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Analyze individual user behavior including watch time, favorite content, and viewing patterns

features.title: Media Library
features.description: Monitor library growth, popular content, and media statistics across movies, TV shows, and music

features.title: Email Notifications
features.description: Send customizable alerts via email, Discord, Slack, or other services for playback events and server

features.title: High Performance
features.description: Monitor server performance metrics including transcoding, bandwidth usage, and resource consumption

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Access complete playback history with filtering, search, and export capabilities for analysis
